bibdata.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE 8802-11:2005/AMD4 [IEEE Std 802.11g-2003] Information technology-- Local and metropolitan area networks-- Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (Mac) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications--Amendment 4: Further Higher Data Rate Extension in the 2.4 GHz Band

ISO/IEC/IEEE 8802-11:2005/AMD4 [IEEE Std 802.11g-2003] Information technology-- Local and metropolitan area networks-- Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (Mac) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications--Amendment 4: Further Higher Data Rate Extension in the 2.4 GHz Band
bibdata.docidentifier: ISO/IEC 8802-11:2005/Amd.4:2006(E) IEEE Std 802.11g-2003 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.11-1999)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Changes and additions to IEEE Std 802.11, 1999 Edition, as amended by IEEE Stds 802.11a-1999, 802.11b-1999, 802.11b-1999/Cor 1-2001, and 802.11d-2001, are provided to support the further higher data rate extension for operation in the 2.4 GHz band.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: ISO/IEC 8802-11 IEEE Std 802.11 Second edition 2005-08-01 ISO/IEC 8802 11:2005(E) IEEE Std 802.11i-2003 Edition
